issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to Reproduce:1
1. Launch Kitchen Sink-iPad
2. Run Open Main Test > Popovers > Popover 1
3. Click Close/Cancel
4. Press Show Popover 1
5. Click Close/Cancel

Actual Result:
Does not close the popover

Expected Result:
Should always close the popover with close/cancel
fields.summary: iPad: Show Popover 1 does not close after every second invoke with the cancel/close button
fields.environment: iPad 4.3.3 with Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (05/05/11 00:38 f8dfdf7...)

comments.body: [INFO] Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (05/10/11 15:22 fdb4ec1...) ipad2, ks-ipad
